title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Strengthening Clinical Pharmacy Practice Competencies (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic pharmaceutical theory and clinical practice fundamentals
context.additional_context: Aims to integrate practical skill-based learning with theoretical knowledge using digital devices

learning_goals: Students analyze five or more virtual patient cases per week over six months to develop clinical judgment competencies for major diseases
Simulate 30+ clinical skills (e.g., drug interaction assessment, treatment planning) via mobile platforms and achieve over 80% proficiency
Advance clinical competencies by at least two stages (novice â†’ advanced beginner) through self-assessment based on the Dreyfus model

resources: Mobile app with real-time feedback functionality

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
